review_data.title: Angenehmes Restaurant mit Sitzplätzen im Garten
review_data.content: Sehr leckeres Essen! Für Zürcher Verhältnisse recht preiswert. Sehr freundlicher Service. Das Wiener Kalbsschnitzel war ein Gedicht.

review_data.title: Great Cordon Bleu - good service
review_data.content: As i need to have at lest 100 characters in my review text, here we go : The title contains my review. I ordered a Corbon bleu (served with vegetables and fries) and it was great I highly recommend this restaurant

review_data.title: Cosy traditional restaurant
review_data.content: Full cosy and full dining room. Great traditional food and very friendly service. Had the deer strips in cognac sauce, delicious! Would definitely go back with any company for an informal dinner.

review_data.title: Ottima cucina svizzera
